ComicInfo.Summary: While out for a jog, Sara uses the Witchblade to stop a child from being abducted by a stranger. Sara and Danielle meet up to say goodbye as Dani begins her new role as the Angelus. Back home, Sara apologizes to Patrick for her Witchblade baggage and they agree to work on their relationship.
ComicInfo.Title: Image United Prelude Chapter 2; Just Like Starting Over
ComicInfo.Penciller: Erik Larsen,Ryan Ottley,Stjepan Šejić,Whilce Portacio,Erik Larsen,Stjepan Šejić
ComicInfo.Inker: Erik Larsen,Ryan Ottley,Stjepan Šejić,Whilce Portacio,Whilce Portacio,Ryan Ottley,Stjepan Šejić
ComicInfo.Colorist: Mike Toris,Nikos Koutsis,Stjepan Šejić,Nikos Koutsis,Mike Toris,Stjepan Šejić
